Origins: On 11 February 2015, the entertainment web site Empire News published an article claiming long time letter-turning hostess Vanna White had been fired from her position on the show Wheel of Fortune :
Description: The above-referenced report about Vanna White being terminated from her Wheel of Fortune gig is completely fictional. A disclaimer on Empire News states all articles published on the web site are meant for "entertainment purposes only." Although Wheel of Fortune has not directly commented on this false news report, it has provided several updates on its social media accounts that prove Vanna White is still a part of the show: Post by Wheel of Fortune.
Example: [Collected via the Internet, February 2015] Did vanna white get fired from wheel of fortune?
Claim: Hostess Vanna White has been fired from Wheel of Fortune .
